Property Description
Second floor gorgeous 4 bed 2 bath with striking kitchen and renovated baths!
Just check those photos...
Located on a cute street in Boston’s Savin Hill, Dorchester neighborhood.
Apartment features nice big bedrooms, hardwood floors throughout, and plenty of light.
Best of all is the location: ideally situated just a short 8 minute walk to the JFK/UMASS stop on the Red Line!
If that wasn’t good enough you’ve got endless bars, restaurants and shops at the end of your street.
I’ve got several units avail in this building for 8/1 and 9/1 just call and ask.
Gas heat and cats negotiable.
Call me today with questions or to schedule a showing.
If this ad is up, its available!
****10% OFF BROKER FEES****
****I'm offering 10% off broker fees through August on this apartment or ANY other unit I have access too.
